mapper.select: select task_info_id, task_id, task_name, spider_name, task_status,finish_status, spider_default_params_all,task_params, start_time, end_time,consume_time, spider_result from spider_spidertaskinfo where task_info_id = #{taskInfoId}

select task_info_id, task_id, task_name, spider_name, task_status,finish_status, spider_default_params_all,task_params, start_time, end_time,consume_time, spider_result from spider_spidertaskinfo where task_id = #{task_id}
mapper.insert: insert into spider_spidertaskinfo ( start_time, end_time, consume_time, spider_result, task_id, task_name, spider_name, task_status, finish_status, spider_default_params_all, task_params )values( sysdate(), sysdate(), #{consumeTime}, #{spiderResult}, #{taskId}, #{taskName}, #{spiderName}, #{taskStatus}, #{finishStatus}, #{spiderDefaultParamsAll}, #{taskParams} )

insert into spider_spidertaskinfo ( task_info_d, end_time, spider_result, task_id, task_name, spider_name, task_status, finish_status, spider_default_params_all, task_params, start_time
)values( taskInfoId, sysdate(), #{spiderResult}, #{taskId}, #{taskName}, #{spiderName}, #{taskStatus}, #{finishStatus}, #{spiderDefaultParamsAll}, #{taskParams}, #{startTime} )
mapper.delete:
delete from spider_spidertaskinfo where task_info_id in
#{taskInfoId}
